DOC.brief_summary: 1. Evaluation of the efficacy of Omacor® in Taiwanese hypertriglyceridemia patients 2. Evaluation of the safety of Omacor® in Taiwanese hypertriglyceridemia patients
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy and Safety Study of Omacor® in Taiwanese Hypertriglyceridemic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The primary end point is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Omacor in Taiwanese hypertriglyceridemia patients.
DOC.criteria: Patient has fasting serum TG ≥ 200 mg/dL but no more than 1000 mg/dL Patients had a history of pancreatitis or considered to be at risk of developing pancreatitis Patient had history of a severe cardiovascular event or a revascularization procedure within 6 months prior to randomization
